mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (select * from BOARD order by SEQ desc) aa) where rnum>#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update BOARD set SUBJECT=#{subject}, CONTENT=#{content} where SEQ=#{seq}
UPDATE BOARD SET REVIEW = REVIEW + 1 where SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(ROWNUM),0) from BOARD where ${catgo} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
